configureLog4j

public static void configureLog4j(String xmlFilename)
Initialize log4j with the specified configuration file.

Parameters:
xmlFilename - The log4j configuration file. It must be in xml format, since the DomConfigurator is used unconditionally. An absolute path is expected.
